item.title: Python Post
item.description: In order to use python in RStudio you have to install the reticulate package and start a code chunk using " {python}." After ensuring that you have python installed on the computer, it's simple to start coding python within RStudio. R can be used within the same markdown document by starting another chunk and using "{R}." import re string1="We have to extract these numbers 12, 47, 48 The integers numbers are also interesting: 189 2036 314\',\' is a separator, so please extract these numbers 125,789,1450 and also these 564,90456 We like to offer you 7890$ per month in order to complete this task.
